title: DNS and SSL Remediation - afterdarksys.com Zone
description: Fixed DNS records pointing to wrong IP (132.226.54.153 instead of 129.80.158.147) and issued new Let's Encrypt certificates for afterdarksys.com and www.afterdarksys.com. Changes: 1) Updated OCI DNS A records for afterdarksys.com, www.afterdarksys.com, api.afterdarksys.com, login.afterdarksys.com, billing.afterdarksys.com, admin.afterdarksys.com, agents.afterdarksys.com, migration.afterdarksys.com to point to OKE LoadBalancer IP 129.80.158.147. 2) Fixed SSL redirect issue blocking ACME HTTP-01 challenges. 3) Successfully issued Let's Encrypt certificate for afterdarksys.com and www.afterdarksys.com. 4) Restarted nginx-ingress controller to pick up new certificate.
